JP residences Facilities

All JP residences tenants have access to the followering:

- Gym
- Cleaning three times a week
- Outside area
- CCTV cameras
- Fingerprint scanner/card scanner to access main entrance
- Smoke detectors and fire extinguishers
- Water included
- Security guard
- Receptionist / lobby
- WiFi
- Smart TV
- balcony
- Undercover parking
- Elevator

A luxurious place to rest in the heart of Vientiane, Laos. We welcome all families, couples and singles to visit and stay.
